full_title: Chill Bae by Lil Uzi Vert
title: Chill Bae

description.plain: “Chill Bae” was released on November 1, 2024, accompanied by a music video that was posted on the same day. The song was revealed just a day before on October 31.

embed_content: Read “Chill Bae” by Lil Uzi Vert on Genius
recording_location: Jungle City Studios, Manhattan, New York City, NY.
